channel.title: Raspberry Pi on Tiffany Chieu
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on Tiffany Chieu

item.title: Running a uCAM-III on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: The uCAM-III from 4D Systems is a compact serial camera module that can output RAW and JPEG images. In this article, we will go through setting up the camera to communicate with a Raspberry Pi, configuring the camera, and, finally, retrieving images from the camera.
